page.title: 08Trade-Witton & Ridlington
page.content: There are 3 village stores:2,Walcott & Witton,are sub-post offices & small supermarkets.Vans travel selling fish ,milk,bread,meat,fish & chips & ice cream.New arrival on the village scene is a video library van.A seasonal stall sells shell fish on the coast at Walcott Gap. {Economics}The 2 sub-post offices provide means of deposition & withdrawing money & drawing old age pensions. {Transport}Most people have cars for shopping,employment outside the area,visits to doctors & dentists surgeries.Some original inhabitants still cycle to N.Walsham.A community bus ceased to run,but Linkwise tours started a local bus to replace the Eastern Counties Service bus giving shoppers about 2\ hours in N.Walsham on Market Day.
